name: GIFT VOUCHERS
description:
A NAIL ART LOVERS DREAM GIFT

This voucher entitles the recipient to £5, £10, £20 or £50 off of any purchase at www.nailedituk.com Just select your chosen amount from the drop down list! We will email you your customisable gift voucher which you can then forward on to your recipient when you want to! Voucher code is valid for 1 use per code. All orders outside the UK there is a £3.50 standard delivery fee.

Gift Voucher Conditions

1. Gift Voucher codes can only be redeemed on purchases at www.nailedituk.com 2. Vouchers must be used on spends over and above the voucher amount - no change can be given. E.g- to use a £10.00 voucher- the spend amount must be £10.01 or more. For example your £10 voucher can be put towards a set of £11.99 nails and your recipient will pay the remaining £1.99. 3. Voucher codes are valid for one spend only- keep them safe! 4. Voucher codes are valid for 12 months from date of initial purchase.

name: Custom Nails & Toes!
description:
Design your very own bespoke nail set. However crazy just get in touch. Think of us as your personal nail artists! Standard option basic hand painted nail art in any shape/length/size = £19.99 which includes glue and a file. Deluxe option hand painted nail art plus any studs/gems and 3D elements or very detailed designs (for example like Aztec designs) = £24.99, which includes glue and a file. Toe nails are also available : £14.99

What do I do now?

1. Select the standard or deluxe option and your size from the drop down menu and head to the checkout to purchase. The length/shape of your nail you would like will be noted during the design process. 2After you have bought we will email you asking for the design you would like. If you're paypal email is different to your personal email please add this in the note to seller section in paypal or send us an email straight afterwards. 3.Due to the extra time involved with custom sets, please email with a clear idea of what you would like so we can quickly create it for you. If you'd like us to design a set from scratch, please bear in mind this will take a bit longer due to the amount of requests received. 4. Once we've painted your set (normally 1-5 days after ordering) We'll email you a picture to make sure you are completely happy. We will then pop them in the post!!

name: A Jolly Christmas
description:
'Tis the season to be jolly, fa la la la la la la la la! Get in the Christmas spirit in an instant and treat yourself and your friends and family to this fun festive set!

Order Details

You will receive a hand painted set of 10 false nails in a black luxury organza tie bag with a hand written tag. We'll also give you a small tube of glue and a nail file.

Sizing

Regular/small size = 16mm (measurement taken across the middle of the largest thumb nail in the set) Medium size = 19.5mm(measurement taken across the middle of the largest thumb nail in the set)

Customisation

If you would like this set in a different colour way, shape or length just email: ask@nailedituk.com or use the contact form on the site prior to purchase. There is no extra charge for this service.

name: Pastel Harlequin
description:
Rate this item!

AS WORN BY GEORDIE SHORE STAR SOPHIE KASAEI - Sophie tweeted: "check out nailedituk.com for unreal hand painted false nails that don't damage your natural nails" Soft pastel shades of yellow, mint, lilac and pink, form a pretty harlequin pattern, broken up with crisp white and a gold stud in the centre.

Order Details

You will receive a hand painted set of 12 false nails (2 different thumb sizes) in a black luxury organza tie bag with a hand written tag. We'll also give you a small tube of glue and a nail file.

Sizing

Regular/small size = 16mm (measurement taken across the middle of the largest thumb nail in the set) Medium size = 19.5mm(measurement taken across the middle of the largest thumb nail in the set)

Customisation

If you would like this set in a different colour way, shape or length just email: ask@nailedituk.com or use the contact form on the site prior to purchase. There is no extra charge for this service.

name: Elegant Touch Super Adhesive Tabs
description:
Rate this item!

If you aren't a fan of using nail glue then these tried and tested tabs are the perfect solution! They claim to last for up to 7 days and will not damage the natural nail. They are also fab if you want to be able to re use your nails as they don't damage the surface of the false nail so much! The pack comes with 24 tabs, so you can use them at least 2 times and have a few spare for any touch ups! ONLY AVAILABLE TO BUY WITH OUR FALSE NAILS. PLEASE DO NOT SELECT THIS ITEM TO BUY SEPARATELY, WE WILL ISSUE YOU WITH A REFUND IF YOU DO SO, THANK YOU

name: Elegant Touch Brush on Nail Glue 6ml
description:
Rate this item!

Product Information

The UK's leading nail care brand has been at the forefront of beauty, style and glamour for more than 30 years offering ground-breaking products to the beauty and fashion conscious consumer. - Dries in 4 seconds! - Ultra strong bond - Ideal for applying artificial nails or tips and repairing broken nails - Easy to use with application brush - Clear glue If you are going swimming/on holiday we would recommend purchasing this and taking it with you for longer wear. NOT TO BE PURCHASED WITHOUT NAILS
